title: Platner Style Stool
body: Platner wanted to infiltrate the modern design vocabulary by creating something that can be described as “decorative, gentle, graceful” and true enough, after pioneering with steel wire furniture, he was able to come up with a collection that has changed the way we look at steels rather than a simple metal. A glamorous piece with a take on modernism, the Platner Style Stool is a 1966 designed chair that will accentuate your modern home today.
